description: Evaluation configuration for Places Search Agent (Day 4b)

notes.tool_trajectory_avg_score: Measures whether agent uses correct tools with correct parameters. 0.7 = 70% tool usage match required
notes.response_match_score: Measures text similarity between expected and actual responses. 0.6 = 60% similarity required
notes.rationale: Lower thresholds (0.6-0.7) allow for natural language variation while catching major errors
